title: (08860) Castelldefels - 337 Passeig del Ferrocarril

title: (08860) Castelldefels - 6 Carrer Santacana

title: (08860) Castelldefels - 159 Passeig Marítim
description: Blue zone beach, width ok for AC, perfect campers.

title: (08860) Castelldefels - 139I Passeig Marítim

title: (08860) Castelldefels - Camí Fondo de Ca n'Aymerich,

description: Near Castelldefels, next to the bus stop. Flat ground in peace. Shaded areas. No service

title: (08850) Gavà - 21 Camí de la Pava
description: Free parking in the shade near to a sports area. No height limit! By bike you reach the beach, markets and restaurants in less than 10 minutes.

name: Camping Estrella de Mar
title: (08860) Camping Estrella de Mar
description: Expensive, sanitary unheated but clean. 24-hour child care. Access to the center of Barcelona from Place de la Catalunya in 45 minutes by bus. It runs every 20 minutes. Playground for children, tennis courts.

title: (08850) Gavà - Carrer la Floresta
description: Nice green area in the forest...some tables for picnic, possibility for a night. Good walks around park from site.

title: (08860) Castelldefels - 23 Carrer 23
description: Parking spaces along the houses. Some (the furthest from the beach) are free. Allows you to go to the beach and take a bus a few steps away to go directly to the center of Barcelona.

title: (08860) Castelldefels - 14 Passeig Marítim
description: Free Parking out of season (from 15 october to 1st of may). There are showers for the beach, they are turned on all year round. Water tap about  50m from parking. Free public toilet near restaurant. Recycling just over the road.

title: (08850) Gavà - 2 Carrer la Falconera
description: Is a closed road finished in forest only birds and a little plane noise but far away.

title: (08850) Gavà - 18 Avinguda la Muntanya
description: Water fountain at playground.

title: (08850) Gavà - 230 C-245
description: Parking area for cars in general, free, near a gas station and a municipal park

title: (08860) Castelldefels - 362 Passeig Marítim
description:
Directly at the beach. Calm and relaxed atmosphere, lots of spaces available and the beach is not as overcrowded as the rest of Barcelona.

There is a train station nearby, the train goes directly into the city centre of Barcelona. (5 Minutes walk)

No service, and there is a height restrictions of 2 Metres.

title: (08850) Gavà - 7c Carrer de Manuel de Falla
title_short: (08850) Gavà - 7c Carrer de Manuel de Falla
description:
Laundromat. If you want to wash 60⁰ you have to  pay extra. 
Bit expensive, but the place looks clean. There is a supermarket right next door to do your shopping while washing

title: (08860) Castelldefels - 39 Passeig Marítim de les Botigues
title_short: (08860) Castelldefels - 39 Passeig Marítim de les Botigues
description: Paid green area in summer until 8:00 p.m., free from 8:00 p.m. to 10:00 a.m., in front of the beach, quiet, safe, shower on the beach. Sunrise in front of the sea, “celeste” beach bar on the beach from 9:00 a.m. to 11:30 p.m., perfect for campers and wide for AC.

title: (08860) Sitges - 66 Carrer del Ferrocarril
description: Free parking 50 meters from the beach

title: (08850) Gavà - 16 Carrer Girona

Free day and night parking in the industrial zone, next to Sharma (climbing area), and a center with mats and games for children.
The parking lot is large, there is almost always a camper van and motorhome, there are no services, near the town of Gava, gas stations, shopping center, parks. Without shadow

title: (08860) Sitges - 5 Carrer Ràfols
description: At 50 meters from the beach behind the bar of buildings in front of sea. Only defect, the line of railway nearby. Pay blue zone since 1-JUL-2017.

title: (08840) Viladecans - 6B Avinguda del Doctor Fleming
description: Gas station of a Carrefour, free filling of water and pressurized air (water and air 24h, gas station and Carrefour normal hours).

title: (08850) Gavà - 36 Avinguda d'Europa
description: Place to spend a night near Barcelona.

title: (08860) Sitges - 3V Passeig Marítim
description: Parking alongside the beach. Couple of motor homes and vans are parked here. Next to surfing spot. You have to come early morning or late at night to get a spot as it’s busy. There’s music until around 1am at a local cafe/bar. Dogs are not allowed on the beach but many people walk their dogs on the beach in the morning. There are some outdoor beach showers

title: (08850) Gavà - 1 carrer de Premià
description: Nearby is a canal for water sports

title: (08850) Gavà - 6 Carrer de Begur
description: Quiet area next to the beach. Snack bar and shade if you like. We slept 2 nights without problems. The police have passed several times and said nothing.

title: (08860) Rat-Penat - Unnamed road
description: Public viewpoint very well located and well cared for. Requires studs to level AC. Avoid the place on Friday and Saturday nights, since it eventually forms a bottle of young people. We have spent the night without problems but being Saturday we had people talking loudly until the wee hours of the morning.

title: (08850) Gavà - 3B Avinguda d'Europa
description: A place to park the van, white lines, you don't pay. I have slept without any problem, no noise and 100 meters from the beach, garbage containers 20 meters. Very quiet street in front of residential buildings with security cameras and a restaurant in front. prices not very expensive.

title: (08870) Sitges - Carretera de Castelldefels
description: Place with a magnificent view of the sea and the entire city. Great sunset. Quiet street

name: Camping 3 Estrellas
title: (08840) Camping 3 Estrellas
description: Campsite near Barcelona, bus nearby (but not allowed with a dog), swimming pool, mini-market, decent sanitary facilities and a restaurant with regional specialities. Access to the beach but beware, extremely noisy campsite day and night (planes taking off every 2 minutes from 7 a.m. to 11 p.m., nearby highway, lots of people partying and as a bonus the smell of the sewage treatment plant)

title: (08870) Sitges - Unnamed Road
description: We ended up here after a steep scary drive up the mountain road. a nice flat parking area with only 2 cars there when we arrived and a view of the sea. the end of the car park is far enough from the road to have some privacy and peace and quiet, with trees for shade and hanging our hammocks. nothing said at entrance about overnight stays, seems ok!

title: (08870) Sitges - Unnamed Road
description: On the same road, lookout to the mountain and beach. There are several points on the road to stop.

title_short: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 3 Carrer de José Agustín Goytisolo

There are also some underground type containers (odors) in the same parking lot and a mechanical workshop can help you if you have a problem, it is called SJD workshop (Jordi) very friendly and good person.

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 4 Carrer de José Agustín Goytisolo
title_short: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 4 Carrer de José Agustín Goytisolo

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 62 Carrer Major
description: Bugaderia autoservei laundry, the man is super friendly, he has 25L cans, every week he throws out some cans. He will give them to you, if you need them, he is a very nice person.

title: (08820) Barcelona - Camí Reial de València

Parking lot at the beginning/end of the runway where the planes fly over you so close you can touch them.

Hiking / cycling (popular cycle path, coveted jogging track on gravel / concrete, picnic at the table or river meadow, garbage bin, space for 20 to 30 cars.

title_short: (08820) El Prat de Llobregat - 152 Carrer de Tarragona

title: (08818) Olivella -

I stayed there 3 nights without worry, but discreet. very little traffic. Calm night with sea view and sunset. 4g networks ok.

Right at the main entrance of the FCB Joan Gamper sports city, during the day it is an area with a lot of traffic, especially during the week. If you are a FCB fan you will be able to see the players. You have an ALDI supermarket right there. About 500 meters away there is also a truck washing center called MUXU, they also wash AC's and bulky vehicles.

title: (08818) Olivella -

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí -

Ideal to go with dogs, since you are parked in a great park. Just 30 meters away there is a drinking fountain, next to the orchards and joan perich school. Negative point. From time to time there are kids making a bottle, and during the week it is a green zone for residents of the area.

title: (08870) Sitges - Carrera Barcelona a Calafell

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 55 Carrer de la TV3
title_short: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 55 Carrer de la TV3
description: Calle de la tv3 free parking area in front of the other parking lot of the conatas building, this has no GALIBO problems and is free, many residents of the area park their campers and AC's there since it is a quiet area.

title: (08870) Sitges - 5 Carrer Surgent
description: A simple park strip next to the street. Not nice, but practical. It is only 5 minutes to Sitges. I stood here one night with no problem. The train tracks run directly behind the parking lot, but there are no trains at night.

title: (08795) Olesa de Bonesvalls - 37B Carretera Gava a Avinyonet
title_short: (08795) Olesa de Bonesvalls - 37B Carretera Gava a Avinyonet

Quiet, beautiful and safe, walking distance from town but a place in nature. However, only suitable for vans with a width of 2 meters!!!

title: (08870) Sitges - Carrer de la Creu Roja
title_short: (08870) Sitges - Carrer de la Creu Roja

title_short: (08960) Sant Just Desvern - 43 Passeig de Can Sagrera

title: (08960) Sant Just Desvern - 16 Carrer de Rosa Luxemburg
title_short: (08960) Sant Just Desvern - 16 Carrer de Rosa Luxemburg
description: Well leveled parking area. Next to a park with playgrounds, tables and a fountain. In the same street there is a bakery, a restaurant with a cheap daily menu and an ice cream parlor with delicious ice creams. In the same street, a bus that takes you to Barcelona in 25 minutes or a train that connects with the metro in a 12-minute walk.

title: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 81 Avinguda d'Amèrica

title: (08907) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 55 Avinguda d'Europa
description: Self-service laundromat. Open Mon-Sun 7am-10pm. Very clean and modern. Detergent is included. You can pay with coins, notes and cards. Parking spaces directly in front. A little tight for large vehicles.

title: (08870) Sitges - 19 Carrer de la Devesa
description: Ground parking

title: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 78 Carretera Sansón
title_short: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 78 Carretera Sansón

Collserola Natural Park. Many tracks and trails for trekking and mountain biking

title_short: (08908) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 105 Carrer de les Ciències

title: (08040) Barcelona - 69 Carrer 3
description: I stood here for several nights but very noisy. Metro close by!

title: (08870) Sitges - 10 Camí Mas d'en Puig
description: Very large gravel parking lot near the highway. The highway is within earshot. OK for a night in transit. Access is also no problem for large campers. Even. The satellite image is deceptive.

title: (08870) Sitges - 5 Carrer de la Devesa
description: Land parking lot next to the Carrefour store. During the day there is traffic because people go shopping, but at night it is calm. We are several motorhomes and their owners tell me that there is no problem. The commissioner is nearby. So it looks like a secure area. Small vehicle only

title: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 100 Riera de la Salut
title_short: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 100 Riera de la Salut
description: At night it is quiet. For the day, yes, it's a good day, it fills up to burst due to the Restaurant and BBQ area there are.

title: (08870) -
description: Motorhome parking, it says that it is paid but there is no parking meter to pay.  It is in the polygon, we spent a quiet night, at 8 in the morning the workers from around us arrived.  There is water.

title: (08870) Sitges - 3B Urbanització Aiguadolc i 12
description: Parking on a residential street above the beach. Parking is level in most places but to secure a space you’d need to get here before 07:00 as it’s very busy with locals. Few other campervans parked along this stretch and as long as you’re respectful and quiet, it seems to be tolerated by the local community. Beach is immediately below the street and there are toilets and a beach shower for rinsing off sand and seawater. No other facilities immediately nearby but a short 5 min walk to the center for plenty of shops restaurants etc. Nearest access for black water emptying is near Lidl, about 7 min drive

title: (08870) Sitges - 43 Avinguda Camí Pla 31
description: Outside parking space to wash your mobile home or large vans.

title: (08908) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - Carrer de les Ciències
title_short: (08908) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - Carrer de les Ciències
description: Street car park with small park area, ideal for day trips to Barcelona, easy access to bus stop to downtown.

title: (08870) Sitges - 26 Avinguda del Camí Pla
description: Revolution Laundery washer and dryer open 24/7 detached in a parking lot

title: (08818) Olivella - 14 Carrer Josep Almirall i Marti
title_short: (08818) Olivella - 14 Carrer Josep Almirall i Marti
description: There is a large car park above the village, next to the cemetery. Great view, many hiking opportunities, free parking space, no prohibition signs or similar. Spent a night here to relax and sleep in nature!

title: (08040) Barcelona - 62 Carrer 3
description: Free parking near the metro, about 40 minutes from the center. Calm. Trafficked by trucks. Nothing bad happened.

title: (08870) Sitges - Avinguda Camí Pla
description: Very quiet area in the parking lot of the Caprabo supermarket you can spend the night perfectly. You have many supermarkets around, since it is located in an industrial estate about 15 min from the center of Sitges  .

title_short: (08870) Sitges - 34V Carrer Pintor Maria Carbonell I Llopis

title: (08757) Can Rigol - Unnamed road
description: Sant Ponç Monastery, Sunday in May, there is no one, perfect for eating, siesta, walking. Due to the heat it is very good to be in the shade and spend air. We will not stay to sleep but for the tranquility and the wide clean space of land another day will be.

title: (08756) La Palma de Cervelló - 25 Carrer Sant Jordi
title_short: (08756) La Palma de Cervelló - 25 Carrer Sant Jordi

title_short: (08902) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 105 Carrer de l'Aprestadora

description: Free parking for the day to visit or stay at the beach.

title_short: (08906) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 12 Avinguda de Manuel Azaña
description: Near metro L5, direct to Sagrada Familia. to sleep another close after 21:00 to find a place

title: (08950) Esplugues de Llobregat - 10 Carrer Josep Anguera i Sala
title_short: (08950) Esplugues de Llobregat - 10 Carrer Josep Anguera i Sala
description: Vacant lot on the heights of Barcelona (pedralbes district) with a flat part where it is possible to sleep. it is free parking (except paying blue zone). No indication or prohibition. we stayed there for 2 days and 2 nights to visit Barcelona. It is not very pretty (some use it as a dumping ground) but there is a view over Barcelona and it is especially convenient because you can go to the city center from there by public transport. Parking is outside the low CO2 emission zone, so also convenient for older vehicles that are not allowed to enter the city. Please be discreet (do not leave the table or other) otherwise the neighbors will complain.

title: (08780) Pallejà - 136 Avinguda Prat de la Riba
title_short: (08780) Pallejà - 136 Avinguda Prat de la Riba
description: Self-service laundry on the main road. You can park nearby without problems.

title: (08750) Molins de Rei - 9999 Camí Can Grané
title_short: (08750) Molins de Rei - 9999 Camí Can Grané
description: Free day parking in the middle of nature with capacity for about 40 vehicles, with several paths for walking and cycling. Picnic area with tables (no barbecue). Ruined monument as a point of interest.

title: (08038) Barcelona - 37.B Carrer de l'Acer
description: Free parking day and night next to Fira Gran Vía North access. It is a commercial and office area. During the day it gets crowded with cars but at night there is plenty of parking space and there is a security guard hanging around the street. The noise of the cars is not excessive. We have slept three nights to visit the caravanning room and it has been a place of 10, also spacious and with little traffic, perfect for playing ball with the dog.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 9 Avinguda d'Albert Bastardas
description: Parking to visit the city of Barcelona and especially 10 minutes walk from Camp Nou to see a football match, stay only one night, in the morning a little too much car passage

title: (08780) Pallejà - 37 Ronda de Santa Eulàlia
description: Parking area next to the Bonpreu supermarket, 5 minutes on foot from the town center and 1 minute from the A2 motorway. Near the gas station. It is an area where you can usually find parking for any type of vehicle. It is next to a promenade full of bars and restaurants where you can eat or have breakfast. There are green areas to walk the dog, a skate area, ping-pong, a water fountain and benches to sit on. Ideal to make a stop and buy at the supermarket or go to eat nearby, or visit the town center.

title: (08038) Barcelona - 23F Carrer del Foc
description: Quiet street 800 m from the subway. We left the camper here for two days and two nights. Shaded and quiet area.

title: (08038) Barcelona - 11 Carrer dels Alts Forns
description: Perfect place to park and visit

title: (08038) Barcelona - 4 Carrer d'Ascó
description: Brand new car park (not yet finished) very little use. Business district so no one in the streets at night. Very quiet street so hardly any nuisance. A second converted van was parked in front of us. So we decided to spend the night, without any worries! Neighborhood lighting all night long. Rather reassuring. Perfect. No restriction sign (during construction in our case) 13min from the beaches.

title: (08902) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 42 Carrer de l'Alhambra
title_short: (08902) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 42 Carrer de l'Alhambra
description: Laundry

title: (08028) Barcelona - 695 Avinguda Diagonal
description: Large parking lot next to the diagonal. Quiet night (traffic noise). Little free in the region.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 8 Carrer de la Torre Melina
title_short: (08028) Barcelona - 8 Carrer de la Torre Melina
description: Wide place and near the L3 metro to go to the city center. We stayed there for 2 nights rather quiet and without problems.

title: (08870) Sitges - 20-22 Carrer Víctor Balaguer
description: Drinking water fountain and outdoor training park (calisthenics)

title: (08870) Barcelona - 10 Carrer de Felip Font i Falp
title_short: (08870) Barcelona - 10 Carrer de Felip Font i Falp
description: Long parking bays (especially good for large vehicles) on a busy road, close to the center. Extremely many places free despite Sunday. We stayed here for at least two nights and no one complained.

address.street: 10 Carrer de Felip Font i Falp

title: (08750) Molins de Rei - 15 Carrer de les Sínies
title_short: (08750) Molins de Rei - 15 Carrer de les Sínies
description: Parking where you can spend the night. I've slept there 4 times without any problems. At night it is quiet. At the end of the parking lot, a path leads to the river, where you can take a nice walk.

title: (08780) Pallejà - 39 Carrer Joan Molins Parera
description: Parking on the municipal market in the center of town. It is accessed by ramp to the roof. Suitable for vans of any size, but AC and trucks it is better not to enter even if it is not signposted. In the market we find several food stalls, two bars, a large Mercadona supermarket, and other shops. There are public restrooms and rubbish bins.

title: (08780) Pallejà - Unnamed road
description: Parking of the railway station in the center of town. Next to the Mercadona supermarket and the municipal market. There are bars and restaurants nearby. Ideal for buying food, visiting the town or taking the trains to Barcelona, Montserrat or other destinations

title: (08750) Molins de Rei - 18 Carrer de Ramon Llull
title_short: (08750) Molins de Rei - 18 Carrer de Ramon Llull
description: Parking space for empty industrial halls, just outside the center. Traffic noises in the background but not disturbing. Have slept peacefully here.

title: (08038) Barcelona - 16 Carrer de l'Estany
description: On this street it is still free to park, on both sides

title: (08960) Esplugues de Llobregat - Plaça de Mireia
title_short: (08960) Esplugues de Llobregat - Plaça de Mireia
description: Picnic area with a beautiful view. Drinking water fountain behind the café. Hiking trail with a city view. To be recommended as a place to sleep. Flat parking spaces available in the roundabout. Police drove past at night but left us in peace.

title: (08870) Sitges - 90 Lloc Can Bort
description: Close to town, easy to find, free. We are 10 motorhomes, quiet.

title: (08870) Sitges - 44 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet
title_short: (08870) Sitges - 44 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet
description:
Free parking day and night just 2 minutes from the beach.
There are additional parking spaces in the streets behind.
Street is busy but we slept very well.

address.street: 44 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet

title: (08870) Sitges - 27 Passeig Marítim
description: Paid parking in the blue zone from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. and from 4 p.m. to 8 p.m. We cannot pay more than 3 hours in a row otherwise you have to come back to put an extra 1 hour (time stamp), especially put the ticket visible on the windshield. The police drove by several times without even looking at us. Otherwise beautiful view of the Mediterranean. Quiet despite the busy road. All commerce nearby with the center of Sitges.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 65 Carrer de Carreras i Candi
title_short: (08028) Barcelona - 65 Carrer de Carreras i Candi
description: Underground parking ideal for visiting the city. near the subway (line 1)

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Stone car park next to the road between Pallejà and the Fontpineda urbanisation. It is completely flat, sunny, and surrounded by nature. There are trails in the surrounding area to walk up the mountain. Crossing to the other side of the road there is a path that leads to the Pallejà antenna, where you can enjoy the panoramic views of the region and Barcelona.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 8 Carrer d’Adolf Florensa
description: Small earthen car park between the buildings. Possible in motorhome

title: (08870) Sitges - 27 Lloc Casalot
description: Just for a night stopover if the local campsites are overbooked. Busy street and area under construction in the morning from 8:30. Alone with children, we seemed sure. We spent 2 nights here and took advantage of Sitges train station to get to Barcelona.

title: (08870) Sitges - 123 Passeig de Vilanova
description: Possibility of parking next to an avenue. It is free and you can spend the night. It is 4 blocks from the beach. as negative is that a lot of vehicles pass and there is a lot of noise to sleep.

title: (08870) Sitges - 2 Carrer Reverendo Joan Lloveras
description: Blue zone street. Very quiet place, next to the beach. One-way road parking. A short walk from the center. No services other than the showers on the beach.

title: (08870) Sitges - 64 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet
title_short: (08870) Sitges - 64 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet
description: FREE parking on residential street, just outside the Blue (paid) parking zone. We stayed for 4 nights, no problem. Short walk to beach, 10 minutes to restaurants and shops.

address.street: 64 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet

title: (08038) Barcelona - 97.B Carrer del Foc
description: Free parking. Frequented but quiet. Great for those traveling alone and don't want an isolated place.

title: (08870) Sitges - 116 Passeig de Vilanova
description: Space at side of the road set back a bit for about 3 campers. There are spaces all along the road too if this is full. No services but close to beach and 3 of us stayed here for 2 nights no problem.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 20U Carrer d'Arístides Maillol
description: Busy car park next to sports fields, close to Camp Nou and the university. During the day many tourists, (parents of) athletes and students pass through. In the evening it gets quieter (and grittier). No parking during FC Barcelona matches.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 22 Carrer de Pau Gargallo
description: Large parking lot near the Camp Nou and the Royal Palace metro station. It seems that you can not park if there is a game.

title: (08750) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - Carretera del Sanson
title_short: (08750) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - Carretera del Sanson
description:
Parking, at night it is quiet. During the day people come to use the picnic tables.
There is also a restaurant.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 7 Carrer de Martí i Franquès
title_short: (08028) Barcelona - 7 Carrer de Martí i Franquès
description: Free parking on the street. We moved a little bit up and down the same street. Best time to get a spot was before 6am and after 10pm. There is a cctv on the nearest building (university), parks, benches and trashcans nearby. No problems for us, not really noisy. Tube is really close (top corner of the street) and it takes around 25 mins to the center.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 643 Avinguda Diagonal
description: Close to football stadium Barcelona.

title: (08870) Sitges - 3 Carrer Antoni Muntañola
description: In the square, in front of the Church, there is a park where we have been able to eat in the shade. There is a public fountain. In addition you can park around and we believe that sleeping without problems too. There is no indication that prohibits the overnight stay. Beach nearby with shower and toilet.

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Large dirt and grass car park without services next to the forest between the institute and the Pallejà cemetery. Suitable for any vehicle. Fairly flat and with some shaded areas. It is out of town but not far. It is reached by paved road. There are higher places for those who dare or have a 4x4. It is surrounded by nature and is a good starting point for excursions to the mountains or visiting Pallejà or the Font de les Rovires waterfalls in just 15 minutes. It is a quiet place, although it is close to the train tracks and highways, so during the day there is some noise. I have confirmed by calling the local police that AC and camper can park here.

title: (08780) Pallejà - Camí de Can Coll
description: Dirt parking next to the access to the Font de les Rovires and the waterfalls. One of the best and most isolated rural areas near Pallejà. It is reached by the road that goes up to the institute, then turns into a dirt road that narrows in some places. There are areas where there is only room for one vehicle and areas with a slope. Be careful as there are parts of the road that are not easy with large vehicles, but it is worth going. At Font de les Rovires there is a natural water spring, waterfalls and a picnic table in a beautiful natural setting.

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Grassy esplanade in the middle of the forest away from the main road. There are plenty of flat, shaded parking spaces. It is located next to the path that goes to the Font de les Rovires and the Pallejà mountains. It is accessed from the cemetery by a dirt road. At the beginning it has a slight slope, some ruts and some stones, but later it is flat and wide, very easy to drive with large vehicles. Area frequented by hikers.

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Parking at the entrance to the font de les rovires from the bottom. In the middle of the forest. there are some almost flat spaces to park and with shade. It is at the end of a dead end road. if there are more vehicles it can be difficult to maneuver to turn around, so it is advisable to park facing the exit of the road. It is accessed from the cemetery by a dirt road. At the beginning it has a slight slope, some ruts and some stones, but later it is flat and wide, very easy to drive with large vehicles. In the last section there is a slope and a curve to the left. Then it is to follow the path one more minute to the end. area frequented by hikers.

title: (08870) Sitges - 17 Carrer Antoni Muntañola
description: Parking without services and without being regulated, it is not paid. Some traffic noise but it did not bother us . 500 meters from the beach.

title: (08870) Sitges - 14 Carrer Mestre Manel Torrens
description: Large parking spaces, very quiet until 7 a.m.

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Wide esplanade in the middle of the forest. It is located next to the path that goes to the Font de les Rovires and the Pallejà mountains. There are enough places to park although they are not completely flat. Sunny place much of the day. It is accessed from the cemetery by a dirt road. At the beginning it has a slight slope, some ruts and some stones, but later it is flat and wide, very easy to drive with large vehicles. Area frequented by hikers.

title: (08038) Barcelona - 54.C Carrer del Litoral B-10
description: Parking opposite the cemetery that can accommodate about 10 vans. Large area with grass for animals but not for parking. Right next to the ferries. A bit noisy from the road)

title: (08810) Sant Pere de Ribes - 2A Carrer Joan Cuadras
title_short: (08810) Sant Pere de Ribes - 2A Carrer Joan Cuadras
description: Dead end next to a sports center, very large parking lot, very quiet place to sleep

title: (08780) Pallejà - Camí de Roca d’Adroc
description: Large dirt car park without services next to the Pallejà cemetery. Suitable for any vehicle. Fairly flat and with some shaded areas. It is out of town but not far. It is reached by paved road. It is surrounded by nature and is a good starting point for excursions to the mountains or visit the Font de les Rovires waterfalls in just 15 minutes. It is a quiet place, although it is close to the train tracks and highways, so during the day there is some noise. It does not have services but it does have garbage containers. It is an ideal place to stop. I have confirmed by calling the local police that AC and camper can park here.

title: (08034) Barcelona - 16 Carrer de Castellet
description: Parking near Pedralbes monastery
